wretch.name: Wretch

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

wretch.description: A stunted and misshapen humanoid form covered in filthy rags that has long since been driven feral by the SludgeWorks.

sludge_fiend.name: Sludge Fiend

corpse.name: Mutated corpse
corpse.description: A mangled mound of mutated flesh. This creature used to be human.

sludge_fiend.description: A ravenous humanoid creature with a maw of sharp yellowed teeth. The remains of clothing cover its torso, and discoloured spikes erupt in clusters from its emaciated body.

thresher.name: Thresher

corpse.name: Giant mutated corpse
corpse.description: The corpse of a humanoid much larger than a man was stuck down, resting forever here.

thresher.description: A colossal ogre-like hominid covered in patches of matted hair and littered with scars. It smashes everything it can find with childlike glee.

moire_beast.name: Moire Beast

corpse.name: Dazzling beast corpse
corpse.description: With the beast dead, the dazzling scintillations of its hide are no more. It's body is agile, cat-like and starved.

moire_beast.description: A short four-legged beast with an intricate and migraine-inducing greyscale pattern printed over its body. Its yellow catlike eyes peer out from its dazzling form.

lupine_terror.name: Lupine Terror

corpse.name: Beast corpse
corpse.description: The corpse of a beast-like predator, with blood-matted fur, yellowed teeth and a horrid odour. This perversion of nature is terrifying.

lupine_terror.description: This upright beast is nothing but fangs and matted, grey fur. It twiches constantly, shying from the light as frothy saliva drips from its mouth.

bloodseeker.name: Bloodseeker

corpse.name: Bloodseeker corpse
corpse.description: Death does not greet the body of this terror warmly. It raises no breath and its blood runs cold, but continues to twitch grotesquely as its muscles refuse to disobey the destroyed nervous system.

bloodseeker.description: An asymmetric monstrosity the size of a bear, rippling with muscle. Rusted weaponry is embedded within its body, sticking out in many directions, with pale and twisted flesh creeping up the hilts. It regularly cries out in agony.
